tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE guest_demographics (
  guest_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  age INT,
  email VARCHAR(100),
  phone_number VARCHAR(20),
  check_in_date DATE,
  check_out_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE guests (
    guest_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name TEXT,
    last_name TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    phone_number TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE reservations (
    reservation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    guest_id INT REFERENCES guests(guest_id),
    check_in_date DATE,
    check_out_date DATE,
    room_number INT
);

CREATE TABLE campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name TEXT,
    campaign_type TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE guests (
    guest_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    guest_name VARCHAR,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR,
    country VARCHAR
)
